Detailed Description

Class that will allow to detect obstacles and return laser readings based on the FOV.

◆ detectObtacle()

bool ObstacleDetection::detectObtacle ( sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr  laserScan)

boolean used to detect if there is a close obtacle with in the field of view and Specific parameters

bolean used to detect whether an obtacle is with a specific distance and in the field of view

Parameters
laserScan
Returns
true if No obstruction is detected with in given thershold
false If target is with in the tolerance of field of view (obstacle detected)
Parameters
[in]laserScan.sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr
Returns
true if obtacle not detected with given conditions
false if obstacle detected with the given conditions
